Room.Name: Dumbwaiter Shaft
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the kitchen dumbwaiter shaft.
Room.LongDescription: Evidently this was the means of delivering food to somewhere deep down in the depths of the castle. You might be able to go down there, but the shaft is so small you could never do it with all of the equipment you have with you. There is a terrible stench coming from down there.
